ch0262_00_rose/0101_0701_02_10: Could you show me around Pasio again today?
ch0262_00_rose/7101_0701_01_10: Ah, you’d like my autograph, too, eh?
ch0262_00_rose/7101_0701_02_10: Oh no, it seems I forgot my pen! Terribly sorry.
ch0262_00_rose/7102_0701_01_10: Just as I remember—Pokémon battles are a blast!
ch0262_00_rose/7102_0701_02_10:
Ever since I’ve been in my current position, I’ve
had a difficult time finding the opportunity to have
proper battles.
ch0262_00_rose/7102_0701_03_10:
So I’m glad that on Pasio, I can battle to my
heart’s content!
ch0262_00_rose/7103_0701_01_10:
Just like Pasio’s sync stones, there are hidden
discoveries out there in the world, just waiting
to be found...
ch0262_00_rose/7103_0701_02_10:
And it’s Macro Cosmos’s duty to put them to good
use in everyone’s lives.
ch0262_00_rose/7104_0701_01_10:
Our lives and society require various types of
energy sources, such as electricity, natural gas,
and water.
ch0262_00_rose/7104_0701_02_10:
Remember that it’s thanks to many people and
Pokémon that our daily lives are possible.
ch0262_00_rose/7105_0701_01_10:
[Name:PlayerNickname ], I can sense that you
shine with talent, just like Leon!
ch0262_00_rose/7105_0701_02_10:
If you ever come to Galar, allow me to endorse
you as a Gym Challenger!
ch0262_00_rose/7105_0701_03_10: I bet you’d liven up the atmosphere!
ch0262_00_rose/1701_0701_01_10: I was thinking of giving you this!
ch0262_00_rose/1701_0702_01_10: I wish you the best in your future endeavors!
ch0262_00_rose/2501_0701_01_10:
Have you ever imagined what Pasio would be like
a millennium from now?
ch0262_00_rose/2501_0701_02_10: It’s an artificial island with no wild Pokémon.
ch0262_00_rose/2501_0701_03_10:
But in a millennium, perhaps a great variety
of Pokémon will call this place home, just like
in Galar.
ch0262_00_rose/2501_0702_01_10: I’ll do whatever I can to help this island.
ch0262_00_rose/2501_0702_02_10:
I’m looking forward to seeing how Pasio develops
as an artificial island!
ch0262_00_rose/2511_0701_01_10: Have you already met Oleana, my secretary?
ch0262_00_rose/2511_0701_02_10:
She’s quite brilliant, but she can be overly strict
at times... Perhaps not the best quality, eh?
ch0262_00_rose/2511_0702_01_10:
I’ve got a great deal of things I want to ask you!
Why don’t we chat over a quick—
ch0262_00_rose/2511_0702_02_10:
Oh! Actually, I’m afraid I may have something
scheduled after this...
ch0262_00_rose/2511_0702_03_10:
I should return to work before Oleana gives me
another earful. Let’s chat another time!
ch0262_00_rose/3001_0701_01_10:
Hello there, you who will inherit the future. You’re
looking energetic!
ch0262_00_rose/3003_0701_01_10:
Let’s work hard this afternoon! It’s best to finish
what needs to be done as soon as possible!
ch0262_00_rose/3005_0701_01_10:
Light shines through the night. My mission is to
keep that light shining a millennium from now.
